name: Ryan Greg Bob
description:
This is my game for my first game jam Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme of "Stronger Together".

Game is about solving puzzles using RGB colors.  This game is for 3 poeple. Each one plays one color. I tried to make the gameplay as balanced as possible for all players.

Music: https://www.bensound.com

Have fun!
